scenes.background: You suggested focusing on the presentation first. [Bob] nods in agreement.
scenes.description: [Monica] raises an eyebrow and says, 'So, are we ignoring the report completely now?'

options.text: Not at all, Monica. Let's get the presentation done first and tackle the report right after.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy by addressing Monica's concern, but motivation might be affected by the additional workload.

options.text: I thought we agreed on focusing on the presentation. The report can wait.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills by reaffirming the decision, but empathy is lower as it dismisses Monica's concern.

options.text: Maybe we should re-evaluate and see if there's a way to manage both simultaneously.
options.analysis: You show good empathy and self-regulation by suggesting a balanced approach, but emotional perception could be better as it might confuse the focus.
